contents.author: Maurice Sendak.
contents.title: Books About. Caldecott & Co. : notes on books and pictures

notes: Chapter headings include: Mother Goose, Randolph Caldecott, Hans Christian Andersen, Lothar Meggendorfer, Beatrix Potter, Winsor McCay, Jean de Brunhoff, and Walt Disney; includes autobiographical essays. 1. Children's literature

History and criticism. 2. Caldecott Medal books. 3. McCay, Winsor. 4. Brunhoff, Jean de, 1899-1937. 5. Disney, Walt, 1901-1966. 6. Potter, Beatrix, 1866-1943. 7. Mother Goose. 8.
